mapper.insert: insert into t_receipt (ID, USER_ID, CODE, PRICE, STATUS, DEPOT_ADDRESS, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_CODE, INSURANCE_NAM, INSURANCE_NO) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depotAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_receipt
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPOT_ADDRESS = #{depotAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_NAME = #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURANCE_NAM = #{insuranceNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURANCE_NO = #{insuranceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_receipt set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPOT_ADDRESS = #{depotAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_NAME = #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURANCE_NAM = #{insuranceNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURANCE_NO = #{insuranceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM t_receipt WHERE USER_ID = 1 LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM t_receipt WHERE USER_ID = 1
